SCTX:
Begin SovngardeBook

short done
short OnPCEquip
short PCSkipEquip

if ( done == 1 )
	set PCSkipEquip to 0
	return
endif
set PCSkipEquip to 1

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BrodirGrove >= 20 )
	if ( onactivate == 1 )
		Journal "BM_BrodirGrove" 30
		set done to 1
		activate
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BrodirGrove < 20 )
	if ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
		set done to 1
		activate
	endif
endif


if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BrodirGrove >= 20 )
	if ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
		MessageBox "Read book"
		Journal "BM_BrodirGrove" 30
		set done to 1
		activate
	endif
endif


end SovngardeBook
